full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 293-1 Filed 05/25/21 Page 345 of 349 By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them. R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY Dated: 10/30/07 By: A. ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN DOJ-OGR-00004642
